title: Sri Lanka vs Australia : T20I squad announced by Sri Lanka Cricket
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Cricket on Wednesday (1) announced the 18-member squad that will play in the T20I series against Australia.
The first T20I will be played on June 07th at the R.Premadasa Stadium, Colombo, with the second T20I to be played the next day, June 8th.
The 3rd T20I will be played on June 11th at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Pallekele.
